header.author: John Anderson
header.title: A preliminary introduction to the act of sea-bathing; wherein is shewn its nature, power, and importance; With Some Necessary Hints For The Attention of Visiters, At The Watering Places, Previous to, And During A Course of Bathing By John Anderson, M.D., F.A.S., ... Physician to, And A Director of, The General Sea-Bathing Infirmary, At Margate.
